## Derefed type

If `T` is a [IDeref](./api.ideref.md)<!-- -->, returns its value type or else `T`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Derefed<T> = T extends IDeref<any> ? ReturnType<T["deref"]> : T;
```
